name: Serene Cure
description: This Pokemon's body will siphon toxins from the earth and even other mons. When exposed to the right flower it may undergo a transformation.
effect: At the end of the round, if this Pokemon has a Status Ailment, it Rolls 4 Chance Dice to heal itself. The User is only cured of one Status at a time. If afflicted by multiple Statuses the User selects which status to remove at random. As a Bonus Action on their turn the User may select an Ally afflicted by a Status and transfer one Status to themselves, curing the target (this effect cannot be used on the Blocked, Disabled or Rampage Statuses). While undergoing a Stat Reset the character may choose to change forms.
